name: About me
tagline: Computer Science / Informatics / Software / Systems Engineer
body:
Postdoctoral researcher in Computer Science at INRIA, Rennes, France and
Associate Researcher in Software Systems at CITI-UNL, Caparica, Portugal [read more...]

Please do not hesitate to contact me for:

Teaching and training in any of my research areas,
Establishing collaborative work,
Solving interesting software engineering problems.
My e-mails are (replace "?" by "a"):

m?uricio.?lferez at inri?.fr
